traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Searing Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the roc takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
entries: The roc sheds bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8 damage) piercing damage and 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8 damage) slashing damage and 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Inferno {@recharge 5}
entries: The roc beats its wings, creating a swirling conflagration. Each creature within 30 feet of the roc must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or take 21 (6d6 damage) fire damage.
